channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WY

item.title: Report E-2023090779
item.description:
Report E-2023090779

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: CHEYENNE
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: GROENDYKE TRANSPORT INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver verifies with customer and has them sign off stating the product will fit in the tanks based on their gauge readings. Driver unloads at first three spots with no issues. Driver finishes his last unloading spot and toward the last little bit of product the tank overflows out of the top. Inaccurate gauge readings reflecting even after unloading. Driver shuts down unloading and reports to customer and safety. Customer conducted the cleanup.

item.title: Report X-2023090332
item.description:
Report X-2023090332

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: CHEYENNE
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: No issues- when getting unloaded you could see the top was a little wet. DescribePack: loose cap- the cap was loose. making a small leak DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: staff grabbed the packages and got it to the QA area. No gas just small leak
